assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: PC Jeweller Limited manufactures, retails, and trades in gold jewelry, diamond studded jewelry, and silver items in India. The company sells its jewelry through its showrooms and Website, wearyourshine.com. As of March 31, 2020, it had 83 showrooms, including 11 franchisee showrooms. The company also exports its products. PC Jeweller Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Delhi, India.
